attributes.description: Enable your application or app extension to discover the current user of the device.
attributes.name: User Management

attributes.description: Data protection allows an app that accesses sensitive user data to use the built-in encryption available on some devices.
attributes.name: Data Protection

attributes.description: VMNet indicates whether the app manages virtual network interfaces without escalating privileges to the root user.
attributes.name: VMNet

attributes.description: Family Controls enables your app for parental controls, granting access to the Managed Settings and Device Activity frameworks in the Screen Time API.
attributes.name: Family Controls (Development)

attributes.description: DriverKit Allow Third Party UserClients
attributes.name: DriverKit Allow Third Party UserClients

attributes.description: The Wireless Accessory Configuration capability allows an app to configure MFi Wi-Fi accessories.
attributes.name: Wireless Accessory Configuration

attributes.description: Wallet presents digital passes—such as a coupons, tickets for a show, or boarding passes—that allow users to redeem real-world products and services.
attributes.name: Wallet

attributes.description: Hotspot configurations allow an app to configure Wi-Fi networks.
attributes.name: Hotspot

attributes.description: Apple Pay Later Merchandising allows an app to message the availability and benefits of Apple Pay Later by displaying the Apple Pay Later visual merchandising widget.
attributes.name: Apple Pay Later Merchandising

attributes.description: Allows 3rd party developers to be able to pass in the setup code information to pair Matter accessories to their ecosystem or Apple Home without having to scan a QRCode.
attributes.name: Matter Allow Setup Payload

attributes.description: The network extensions capability allows app extensions to extend and customize the networking capabilities of a device.
attributes.name: Network Extensions

attributes.description: DriverKit Transport HID for development
attributes.name: DriverKit Transport HID (development)

attributes.description: Multipath allows an app to use Multipath protocols like Multipath TCP, which seamlessly hands over traffic from one interface to another.
attributes.name: Multipath

attributes.description: Capability to migrate apps to macOS platform

entitlements.name: App Identifier Entitlement for Marzipan profiles

attributes.name: Mac Catalyst

attributes.description: Enabling Custom Network Protocol allows your app to use custom network protocols that run on top of IP, or use custom network protocols that run on top of the network link layer.
attributes.name: Custom Network Protocol

attributes.description: Inter-App Audio allows an app to send audio to and receive audio from other Inter-App Audio-enabled apps.
attributes.name: Inter-App Audio

attributes.description: The Journaling Suggestions entitlement allows an application to invoke the suggestion sheet for users to choose what they want to journal about and save it to the app.
attributes.name: Journaling Suggestions

attributes.description: Time Sensitive notifications deliver information that demand immediate attention and directly call on the individual to take action in the moment they receive them. Time Sensitive alerts are always delivered immediately, surfaced above other notifications, and allowed to break through Focus and Do Not Disturb.
attributes.name: Time Sensitive Notifications

attributes.description: Provide access to depth data under water up to a safe limit.
attributes.name: Shallow Depth and Pressure

attributes.description: WeatherKit provides current and forecasted weather information.
attributes.name: WeatherKit

attributes.description: Apple Pay provides an easy and secure way for users to pay in an iOS app, watchOS app, and website on Safari.
attributes.name: Apple Pay Payment Processing

attributes.description: iCloud Storage APIs enable your apps to store data and documents in iCloud, keeping your apps up to date automatically. Use iCloud to give your users a consistent and seamless experience across iCloud enabled devices.
attributes.name: iCloud

entitlements.name: ICloud Container Env - MAC Direct Distribution
ICloud Container Env restriction (non MAC Direct)

attributes.description: Enable a test-only mode where developers can control the timing of operations in fileproviderd, in order to programmatically hit all the possible orderings in what is otherwise a blackbox.
attributes.name: FileProvider Testing Mode

attributes.description: Media Device Discovery allows for the integration of 3rd party media casting protocols into iOS system UI through an application extension that handles custom protocol discovery.
attributes.name: Media Device Discovery

attributes.description: DriverKit Family Serial for development
attributes.name: DriverKit Family Serial (development)

attributes.description: This entitlement enables wireless carrier apps to detect if a user's device has a SIM or eSIM installed associated to an individual carrier. This ability is to support carrier specific features and services by verifying that the device is using their own wireless carrier.
attributes.name: SIM Inserted for Wireless Carriers

attributes.description: Allows apps to use iOS system UI to display a subset of ID data for use cases that only require visual confirmation. This data request is limited to portrait, full name, age, and age over NN.
attributes.name: ID Verifier - Display Only

attributes.description: ClassKit allows an education app to work with the Schoolwork app used by educational institutions.
attributes.name: ClassKit

attributes.description: Marks an ExtensionKit extension as being a FSKit filesystem.
attributes.name: FSKit Module

attributes.description: DriverKit Family HID Device for development
attributes.name: DriverKit Family HID Device (development)

attributes.description: Head Pose allows apps to use framework methods that access a user's head pose on capable devices.
attributes.name: Head Pose

attributes.description: Allows an app to communicate with the same app on one or more other devices to create a group activity within a FaceTime call.
attributes.name: Group Activities

attributes.description: This entitlement enables MIDI DriverKit extensions to access a user client connection from CoreMIDI.
attributes.name: DriverKit Family MIDI (development)

attributes.description: HealthKit Estimate Recalibration allows an app to tell the device to recalibrate its estimates for specified sample types.
attributes.name: HealthKit Estimate Recalibration

attributes.description: Managed App Installation UI allows an app built by an MDM vendor to display a view to install and open managed applications.
attributes.name: Managed App Installation UI

attributes.description: DriverKit Family SCSIController for development
attributes.name: DriverKit Family SCSIController (development)

attributes.description: The Siri capability allows an app to handle Siri requests.
attributes.name: Siri

attributes.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether your extension has permission to run as a user-space driver. This is a development only entitlement.
attributes.name: DriverKit (development)

attributes.description: The MapKit framework provides an interface for embedding maps directly into your own windows and views of your app.
attributes.name: Maps

attributes.description: The AutoFill credential provider allows an app to provide user names and passwords for AutoFill in Safari and other apps, with user permission.
attributes.name: AutoFill Credential Provider

attributes.description: Enables your app to report Push to Talk channels to the system so that it can handle transmitting and receiving audio in the background
attributes.name: Push to Talk

attributes.description: Enable your customers to authenticate in your application with their Apple ID.
attributes.name: Sign In with Apple

attributes.description: Enables apps to access additional memory during development and internal testing to enable tools-oriented workflows in high-watermark situations.
attributes.name: Increased Debugging Memory Limit

attributes.description: Enables an app to exceed the default app memory limit on supported devices.
attributes.name: Increased Memory Limit

attributes.description: DriverKit Communicates with Drivers
attributes.name: DriverKit Communicates with Drivers

attributes.description: DriverKit USB Transport (development)
attributes.name: DriverKit USB Transport (development)

attributes.description: HomeKit allows users to manage connected accessories in their home using an app.
attributes.name: HomeKit

attributes.description: Allows apps to send notifications for communication from a person to a person or persons.
attributes.name: Communication Notifications

attributes.description: Near Field Communication (NFC) Tag Reading allows an app to read NFC tags.
attributes.name: NFC Tag Reading

attributes.description: Enabling Extended Virtual Addressing allows you to use more address space in your app.
attributes.name: Extended Virtual Addressing

attributes.description: App Attest allows you to verify that an iOS app connecting to your server is legitimate, by signing the app identity upon connection.
attributes.name: App Attest

attributes.description: Font Installation allows your app, with user permission, to install and use custom fonts.
attributes.name: Fonts

attributes.description: Sustained Execution indicates whether your app can exhibit consistent, sustained performance when the system constrains the app to lower power levels on applicable devices.
attributes.name: Sustained Execution

attributes.description: In-App Purchase
attributes.name: In-App Purchase

attributes.description: Enabling System Extension enables your app to install associated extensins.
attributes.name: System Extension

attributes.description: DriverKit Family HID EventService for development
attributes.name: DriverKit Family HID EventService (development)

attributes.description: DriverKit Family Networking for development
attributes.name: DriverKit Family Networking (development)

attributes.description: Access Wifi Information allows an app to obtain information about the currently connected WiFi network.
attributes.name: Access Wi-Fi Information

attributes.description: Allow 3rd party applications to claim links shared in Messages conversation and to then be surfaced to them via the Shared with You Framework
attributes.name: Shared with You

attributes.description: Associated domains allow an app to be associated with a domain for specific services such as accessing Safari saved passwords and activity continuation.
attributes.name: Associated Domains

attributes.description: Allows MDM to supplement the Associated Domains that are included with your app with values such as server names that are unique for an environment.
attributes.name: MDM Managed Associated Domains

attributes.description: DriverKit Family Audio (development)
attributes.name: DriverKit Family Audio (development)

attributes.description: Sensitive Content Analysis allows an app to detect sensitive images and videos that contain nudity on-device for the intended purposes of allowing users to choose to view the photo before showing it to them, or a heavier weight intervention.
attributes.name: Sensitive Content Analysis

attributes.description: This entitlement is intended for the development of Media Extension format readers for professional video and camera use cases.
attributes.name: Media Extension Format Reader

attributes.description: Allows an app to support initiating collaboration using Messages.
attributes.name: Messages Collaboration

attributes.description: App groups gives multiple apps access to shared containers and allows certain additional communication between the apps.
attributes.name: App Groups

attributes.description: On Demand Install Capable for App Clip Extensions

entitlements.name: On Demand Install Capable for App Clip Extensions

attributes.name: On Demand Install Capable for App Clip Extensions

attributes.description: HealthKit allows an app to read and write health and activity user data that appears in the Health app.
attributes.name: HealthKit

attributes.description: 5G network slicing enables your apps to access dedicated segments of carrier networks to deliver higher levels of performance and quality of service for eligible categories of applications and traffic.
attributes.name: 5G Network Slicing

attributes.description: Game Center allows players to connect to the Game Center service, enabling them to interact with their friends, view leader boards, or play head to head in your game.
attributes.name: Game Center

attributes.description: Push notifications use the Apple Push Notifications service (APNs) to deliver notifications to devices.
attributes.name: Push Notifications

attributes.description: This entitlement is intended for the development of Media Extension video decoders for professional video and camera use cases.
attributes.name: Media Extension Video Decoder

attributes.description: Personal VPN allows an app to create and control a custom system VPN configuration.
attributes.name: Personal VPN

attributes.description: Enables access to user's personalized spatial audio profile.
attributes.name: Spatial Audio Profile

attributes.description: Enables an app to interact with a local thread network to access and manage credentials to interact with hardware on the network.
attributes.name: Manage Thread Network Credentials (development)
